short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension to manage and display NFTs.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Rogue Tools Base presents our first release, Quick NFTs.
_Featuring Based Ape Gang_

- View your NFT collections quickly and comfortably with this sleek tool.
- Copy your NFT's image quickly and paste it to Twitter, Discord, etc.
- Save frequently used wallets for easy and quick access.
More to come.
